Plot: The children of Ballydowse & Carrickdowse engage in battles in which they cut off the buttons, shoe-laces, belts and braces of their captured opponents. This gets their opponents in trouble...
Title: War of the Buttons
Writer: Louis Pergaud (novel), Colin Welland (adapted for the screen by), Yves Robert (based on: the film: La Guerre Des Boutons" by)
Actors: Gregg Fitzgerald, Gerard Kearney, Darragh Naughton, Brendan McNamara
